solve



class solve;
solve:
class for solving matrix

auto gaussian(T)(ref const matrix!T _A, ref const vector!T b);
classic Gauss method

auto seidel(T)(ref const matrix!T A, ref const vector!T b, const T eps);
Seidel method

auto residual(T)(ref const matrix!T A, ref const vector!T x, ref const vector!T b);
residual of solution

Params:
matrix!T A matrix
vector!T x solution
vector!T b condition
